text: The JAC Refine S7 is a compact Crossover SUV made by JAC Motors from 2017 to 2020. == History and Features == The JAC Refine S7 was launched in 2017 its positioned above the JAC Refine S5. it has both five and seven seats versions. the SUV shares its plataform with the JAC Refine A60 and has a 1.5 and 2.0 liter both turbo petrol engines (that are the same engines of the JAC Refine A60) with a 6-speed both manual and Dual-clutch transmissions it was later improved one year later in 2018. == Markets == The JAC Refine S7 was sold mainly in the Chinese market but in Mexico it was made locally through kits CKD and was sold as the JAC Sei 7 in Latin America it was sold as the JAC T80. == Discontinuation == The production of The JAC Refine S7 ended in 2020 and was replaced by the Sehol X7. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: JAC Refine S7
